pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchanti ovādampi na yācanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchissanti ovādampi na yācissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:6.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchanti ovādampi na yācantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:6.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchissanti ovādampi na yācissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:6.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:6.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:7.1: “Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṃghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā—uposathapucchakañca ovādūpasaṅkamanañca. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:8.4: dve uposathā— cātuddasiko ca pannarasiko ca.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:9.3: “Uposathampi na pucchissāmi ovādampi na yācissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
